org.gradle.tooling.connection

Interface GradleConnectionBuilder.ParticipantBuilder

  • Enclosing interface:
    GradleConnectionBuilder

    public static interface GradleConnectionBuilder.ParticipantBuilder
    Builds a new participant that will be included in the connection.
